text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Yüksekova | other_name = Gever | image_skyline =Yüksekova 65.JPG | image_caption = | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Turkey | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = Hakkâri | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | leader_party = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Remziye Yaşar (HDP) | leader_title1 = Kaymakam | leader_name1 = Üzeyir Aziz Özeren | elevation_m = 1950 | area_footnotes = | area_blank1_title = District | area_blank1_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_urban = | population_as_of = | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = Post code | postal_code = 30300 | website = | official_name = }} Yüksekova (, Syriac: Gawar), is a city and a district of Hakkari Province of Turkey. It is on the border with Iran. In February of 2020 it was buried under 6 meters of snow. https://www.cbc.ca/news/world/turkish-village-buried-under-6-metres-that-s-20-feet-of-snow-1.5471514 == References == Category:Cities in Turkey Category:2020 in Europe Category:2020 in Asia
title: Yüksekova
